aka: Love Songs Love Series: Kwarm Cheua

cast.name: 苏帕维特·坦提马彭 Supawit Tantimaporn
蒂蒂卡亚·奇瓦普雷佐 Thitichaya Chiwpreecha

this_title: Love Songs Love Series ตอน ความเชื่อ
trans_title: Love Songs Love Series: Kwarm Cheua
introduction: Kit is a model student who's going to receive a scholarship to study abroad. But problems arise and Olarn came to inform that Kit and 4 other students won't receive the scholarship. The only way to solve this problem is that all of them must gather to form a band to compete in place of the old school band. Kit therefore gathered Tam, Farang, Tao, Ki and Fang. They're not confident that they'll win the competition and they face various obstacles, but Teacher Ben is always there to help encourage them.
foreign_title: Love Songs Love Series ตอน ความเชื่อ
